data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Chahar Mahall and Bakhtiari, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chahar Mahall and Bakhtiari, Iran
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 4,938 believers find a person of peace today among the 942,862 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 191 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Chahar Mahall and Bakhtiari, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Chahar Mahall and Bakhtiari.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Romani, Domari people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please give the people in the state of Chahar Mahall and Bakhtiari access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Chahar Mahall and Bakhtiari, Iran.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Chahar Mahall and Bakhtiari, Iran has a population of 947,800.

We estimate Chahar Mahall and Bakhtiari has 4,938 people who might know Jesus, 12,799 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 930,063 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 191 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 191 neighbors who are far from you in Chahar Mahall and Bakhtiari. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.
